amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: \ TITLE VIII--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS \ SEC. 801. Total appropriations made in this Act are hereby reduced by 1 percent.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to cut total appropriations in the bill by 1% and would leave it to the administration to determine which accounts are cut to achieve the reduction.
